title: FoSCL AGM
text: Open to everyone, the agenda will be available in the Library, on the Website and distributed to Friends and Volunteers.

title: Christmas Refreshments
html: Come along and join us from 2.30pm onwards. An opportunity to meet Volunteers, Friends and Library users and to enjoy mince pies and other delicacies, including Val's famous PUNCH and other less alcoholic but interesting drinks. Or even a cup of tea if you prefer!!

title: MURDER!
html: We are joining with the Chiltern Players to hold a Murder Mystery Evening at 7 pm in the Village Hall on Friday 28th February 2020. Including a Fish and Chip supper, tickets will cost Â£12.50 per person and be on sale in the New Year.

title: Possible Events for next year
html:
• Celebration of 20 years of the Library being in the current building.
  • Short Story Competition
  • Writers evening
  • Volunteers social evening
  • Summer Reading Challenge
  • Oxfordshire Reads
  • School Fair
  • Craft mornings
  • Summer Events for children
  • National Libraries Week
  • FoSCL Quiz
  • New Ideas for 2020
